extendedInfo.description: Countdown to all kinds of events in special ways! Such as: "In 178,326 heartbeats!" OR "In precisely 184,072 minutes" It's fun!, Countdown can countdown to your events in many different units! Years, Months, Days, Hours, Minutes, Seconds or Heartbeats! Sharing your countdown via email or Facebook! There's more: How about an Countdown that can also track anniversaries! Key features: 4x1 widgetFull landscape support Countdown or anniversary for event Many different units to measure your countdown. Different phases to choose from Lovely default images to choose from Use your very own photos as the background Play your favorite music from your iPod while counting down! Premium in app purchase includes: 4x4 widgetMultiple countdowns (up to 10)Custom phrases Ad Banner Removal Happy Countdown!keywords:Countdown, Widget, Anniversary, Planning, Planner, Celebration, Timeline, Party,Big Day, Countdowns, Events, Special, memorial, timer, clock, duration, holiday

reviews.title: Nice feature but....
reviews.comment: Have to upgrade for most custom features.... who would actually pay for this app? Honestly will probably uninstall....
reviews.author: Samantha Perez

reviews.title: Nifty little app/widget.
reviews.comment: I only use the wiget portion of the app... I only wish it had multiple countdown date functions
reviews.author: connie olguin

reviews.title: I love it!!!!
reviews.comment: This is exactly what i needed. No banner or problems n works fine. Thanks for this app!!
reviews.author: Brittany Crosthwaite

reviews.title: ...good (Droid spectrum)
reviews.comment: I like it so far. Only down fall is you can\'t change your banner unless you pay for the up grade. Really? That\'s pointless for the reason of the app, to me. At least you let us customize with a picture.
reviews.author: Kristin Ingold

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.comment: I prefer this app on the iPhone system on android its not the same I prefered it on iphone as you can see days hrs seconds on android u can see only yrs to seconds its nice to see how many months and how many days like- 1 month, 31 days then the rest
reviews.author: Harriet Holton

reviews.title: Premium?
reviews.comment: This would have been great if all the features that made this app out of the ordinary countdowns were free. Sorry, I\'m not paying 2 dollars to title my countdown and use the widget with my chosen picture.
reviews.author: Denise Valsecchi

reviews.title: Rhihafu
reviews.comment: Awful. Made my phone really slow. Kept crashing every time I tried changing the background or setting an alarm for an event. Uninstalled because it\'s so bad.
reviews.author: Rhiannon Fuge

reviews.title: Paid 1.99 for what??
reviews.comment: Paid the 1.99 so I could post this on facebook and IT DOESN\'T FREAKING WORK.. waste of money and a rip off don\'t get
reviews.author: jayson docter

reviews.title: Its alright...
reviews.comment: Without the upgrade, I can only have one countdown and there\'s no widget. So I weekly have to load the ap to see how much closer I am to the date. Other than that, runs smooth.
reviews.author: Mel Okita

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I like the design better than other apps I\'ve seen. Downfall of the free version is that you can\'t have more than one event, but that\'s why there\'s the paid version. I bought the paid version so as to add more events.
reviews.author: Jordan Lowe

reviews.title: Better free count down apps
reviews.comment: Its basic and should be able to do more before purchasing app
reviews.author: Ian Williams

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Nice but for a widget it would be better if it wasn\'t just a banner on your home screen. Loved choosing the background but then found out it only shows when you click into it. Disappointing
reviews.author: Aoife Kelly

reviews.title: Purchase
reviews.comment: I purchased the upgrade to be able to do more and it wont let me do anything more than the few app. So I just patios for the upgrade for nothing....
reviews.author: Rebecca Link

reviews.title: Good for free.
reviews.comment: The only widget I could find that counts Years, Months, Days, for long time periods instead of just counting 1457 days lime other widgets.
reviews.author: Bill Miano

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: App crashes everytime I try to add a photo to an event which I have created. I have paid for the upgraded version, now I want my money back. Anyone know how I can get it back? Thanks.
reviews.author: Katie Burton

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: Buggy. I filled in all the info about my holiday, picked a background thene, took a snapshot to post on facebook, and the photo that gets captured is the original generic demo screen. I went back to the app to make sure that I had saved my created profile, and yes its there, but every time I take a photo, its the demo screen. What a waste of time.
reviews.author: Kelly Kay

reviews.title: U should get it
reviews.comment: Wooow yess i love the ,ountdown!!! Its really good!!! :)))
reviews.author: Sparkle Holloway

reviews.title: Great little app.
reviews.comment: This is a great countdown for various reasons. Only improvement I can think of is making it sync across devices.
reviews.author: Robert Reynolds

reviews.title: It\'s cool
reviews.comment: I enjoy the app. Trying to decide if I wanna upgrade...would enjoy multiple countdowns.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Its really good !
reviews.author: jennifer Gonzalez
